root.name: War: Final Assault
root.description: OverviewWar: Final Assault is a first-person shooter arcade game released in 1999. It has a competitive mode similar to Quake 3 and Unreal Tournament as well as a campaign mode that can be played in co-op. You can play in first or third-person views. You can also play as different characters, each with varying stats.A Nintendo 64 version was planned, but was later cancelled.
